clinicalSignificance.comment: The c.847A>G (p.Ile283Val) variant in PAH is absent from all population databases, and is at the same amino acid as a previously established pathogenic variant (c.847A>T (p.Ile283Phe)). It has been identified in a patient with classic PKU (BH4 defect excluded), and in trans with a known pathogenic variant (c.1045T>C, p.Ser349Pro) PMID: 27121329. Summary evidence using PAH specific ACMG/AMP guidelines :PM2, PM5, PM3, PP4_Moderate.
